params.expiry: The expiry of the api permission
params.permission: The permission to calculate the digest hash for

params.salt: The salt to use for the app

params._appBeacon: The beacon for creating App proxies
params._version: The version string to use for this contract's domain separator

params.salt: The salt to use for the app

returns.app: The address of the newly created app

domainSeparator().details: The domain separator is computed according to EIP-712 specification, using:      - The hardcoded name "EigenLayer"      - The contract's version string      - The current chain ID      - This contract's addressSee https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-712#definition-of-domainseparator.

returns._0: The 32-byte domain separator hash used in EIP-712 structured data signing.
The current number of active apps for the user
The address of the app creator

params.app: The app to get the latest release block number for
The app to get the operator set ID for
The app to get the status for

returns._0: The maximum number of active apps for the user

params.admin: The admin address for the contract

params.limit: The maximum number of apps to return
params.offset: The offset of the first app to return

returns.apps: An array of apps where the developer is an admin and their app configs

setMaxActiveAppsPerUser(address,uint32).details: Caller must be UAM permissioned for the AppController

params.limit: The maximum number of active apps the address can have
params.user: The address to set the limit for

setMaxGlobalActiveApps(uint32).details: Caller must be UAM permissioned for the AppController

params.limit: The maximum number of active apps globally

startApp(address).details: Caller must be UAM permissioned for the appApp must be AppStatus.STOPPED

stopApp(address).details: Caller must be UAM permissioned for the appApp must be AppStatus.STARTED

terminateApp(address).details: Caller must be UAM permissioned for the appOnce terminated, no further write operations are allowed

terminateAppByAdmin(address).details: Caller must be UAM permissioned for the AppControllerOnce terminated, no further write operations are allowed

upgradeApp(address,(((bytes32,string)[],.details: Caller must be UAM permissioned for the appThe rms release must have exactly one artifact, with the digest being the docker image digest and the registry being the docker registry it is stored at.The env must be a JSON marshalled bytes representing the public environment variables for the app.The encryptedSecrets must be a JSON Web Encryption objects of the encrypted secrets for the app encrypted with the kms's public key.The app must not be AppStatus.TERMINATED

params.app: The app to upgrade with the release

returns._0: releaseId The unique identifier for the published release
The version string in SemVer format (e.g., "1.1.1")

API_PERMISSION_TYPEHASH().notice: The EIP-712 typehash for the `DelegationApproval` struct used by the contract

appBeacon().notice: The beacon used for creating App proxies

calculateApiPermissionDigestHash(bytes4,.notice: Calculates the digest hash for a given api permission

calculateAppId(address,bytes32).notice: Calculates the app id for a given deployer and salt

domainSeparator().notice: Computes the EIP-712 domain separator used for signature validation.

getActiveAppCount(address).notice: Gets the current active app count for a user

getAppCreator(address).notice: Gets the creator of an app

getAppLatestReleaseBlockNumber(address).notice: Gets the latest release block number for a given app

getAppOperatorSetId(address).notice: Gets the operator set ID for a given app

getAppStatus(address).notice: Gets the status for a given app

getMaxActiveAppsPerUser(address).notice: Gets the maximum active apps for a user

globalActiveAppCount().notice: Gets the current global active app count

listApps(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Lists all apps for which the given developer is an admin

maxGlobalActiveApps().notice: Gets the maximum global active apps limit

permissionController().notice: Pointer to the permission controller contract.

setMaxActiveAppsPerUser(address,uint32).notice: Sets the maximum active apps limit for a specific address

setMaxGlobalActiveApps(uint32).notice: Sets the global maximum active apps limit

startApp(address).notice: Starts an app, which starts the instance backing it

stopApp(address).notice: Stops an app, which stops the instance backing it

terminateAppByAdmin(address).notice: Terminates an app permanently by admin

upgradeApp(address,(((bytes32,string)[],.notice: Upgrades an app with a new release to the ReleaseManager

version().notice: Returns the semantic version string of the contract.
